00314     typedef struct  {
00315         tObjectKind mKind;   /* file or directory */
00316         char *mName;         /* the name of the file */
00317         tTime mLastMod;      /* the last modification time for the file*/
00318         tOffset mSize;       /* the size of the file in bytes */
00319         short mReplication;    /* the count of replicas */
00320         tOffset mBlockSize;  /* the block size for the file */
00321     } hdfsFileInfo;
